title: TRUMP WINS AGAIN! Trolls Kamala Harris into Finally Visiting the Border
description:
Kamala Harris is finally visiting the border. Well, kinda. And only because Trump trolled her into doing so. Her sidekick Joe Biden told more lies about guns and gun violence. Those get thoroughly debunked. And to cap off Cultural Appropriation Month with a salute to California, the top 5 ways California is a horrible place to live! It was tough narrowing it down... #California #KamalaHarris #JoeBiden
